name: Six-Sided Shooter
description:
Controls: mouse - shoot, space - pause

They call you the potato cowboy on account of you looking like a potato and wearing a cowboy hat. Shoot your way through the hordes of dice for as long as you can.

Pick up dice from fallen enemies. Pause with space to roll your dice and spend them on upgrades. The dice you pick up are single-use and the buffs are temporary so keep picking up dice.

Made by me with Unity, Bfxr, Audacity. Code: https://github.com/TyLanger/SixSidedShooter

Art from Kenney. https://kenney.nl/assets/boardgame-pack, https://kenney.nl/assets/crosshair-pack, https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll of the Dice. Tried to use the dice to give temporary buffs with the limited dice pool making you weigh your options differently each time.
